SECRET

FIRS. SENTAL NO.
000519
BIOGRAPHIC PROFILE (PART 2)
NAME (Last-Priest-studite)
DATE OF BIRTH
ORP, Howard McOres
22 Jul 1922
23. PHOTOGRAPH
24. IDENTITY OF OTHER DOCUMENTS WHICH SHOULD BE REVIEWED IN DETAIL
SEE COVER HISTORY ATTACHED.
25. ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
Compendation 1969 from Ch,Sov Bloc Div for contribution to a fast moving operational
situation which existed in the Internal Operations Group of SB Div, caused by a series o
Bloc intelligence officer defections, during the months of July and Aug 1969. DDP conci
in this commendation.
Award 1969 Certificate of Distinction in recognition of superior performance of duty
while serving under conditions of turmoil and hazard during the Tet Offensive of 1968.
Appreciation 1971 from Ch,EUR Div for the Intelligence Watch assistance to the
Division.
Letter of Comnendation 1976 from Chief, CI Staff for Subject's exemplar
performance while on a six months detail to CI Staff as operations survey
team member and his substantive review of two DDO Stations.
26. DATE REVIEWED
27. PROFILE REVIEWED BY
25 Apr 1977
m31/obs
FORM
1200 (PART 2) USE PREVIOUS
2-68
EOTITIONS
SECRET E 2. IMPOET
CL BY 007622
PROFILE
(4)
